reservation_disclaimer:
The collected personal information will be destroyed on the same day.

Reservation will be automatically canceled if arrival is delayed by more than 5 minutes.

* Only one representative can make a reservation (duplicates may result in penalties).
reservation_agree: I have read and understood all the above information.
reservation_please_agree: Please agree to the collection of personal information.
reservation_breaktime_alert:
Day booth reservations will be deleted after 16:35
to prepare for the evening booths.
reservation_cancel_confirm_one: Do you want to cancel the reservation?
reservation_cancel_confirm_other: Do you want to cancel all reservations?
reservation_already: You have already reserved this booth.
reservation_enter_username: Please enter the name of the reservation holder.
reservation_enter_valid_phone_number: Please enter a valid phone number. (e.g. 010-1234-5678)
reservation_headCount_only_number: Please enter only numbers for the headcount.
